name: Claire Foley
about: WOW!!! just wow, the speed of this thing in day to day tasks is unreal. Love the instant wake too, the display is on and ready before you've even opened the lid fully.

name: Griffith Davidson
about: Super fast, with outstanding battery life. Easily lasts a day of intensive usage.

name: Beth Key
about: Brilliant new version of the MacBook Air with incredible battery life, superb performance and ease of use.

name: Bond Morales
about: Yes there are cheaper laptops, but this is an exceptional all-rounder. If you're on the fence, push the button, you won't regret it.

name: Erika Odom
about: This laptop is incredible, it is extremely fast, much much faster than the Dell, in fact the Dell didnâ€™t come anywhere near it in terms of speed.

name: Mosley Stevenson
about: I switched to Macs a few years ago having grown very tired with windows, they are excellent and this MacBook Air is no exception.
